title: The Industrialist
plot_threads_advanced: Evelyn Thorne arrives proposing corporate partnership with Prometheus Industries
Thorne reveals she's been monitoring team's work for 6 weeks
Offers resources (supercomputing, encryption, legal protection) in exchange for commercial rights
Warns government containment will happen immediately after publication
Team tables decision until after publication to see actual response
Thorne provides strategic communication advice for disclosure

Marcus Reid.state: Wrestling with pragmatism vs idealism in resource needs
Marcus Reid.key_moment: Decides to table Thorne decision until after publication

Sofia Navarro.state: Suspicious of corporate involvement, defending pure collaboration
Sofia Navarro.key_moment: Argues corporate partnership betrays first contact principles

Yuki Tanaka.state: Torn between loyalty to former mentor and suspicion of corporate motives
Yuki Tanaka.key_moment: Recognizes Thorne still cares about science but thinks like CEO

Evelyn Thorne.state: Revealing her complexity - wants to contribute to meaningful science again
Evelyn Thorne.key_moment: Admits she hates being the villain, misses pure scientific work

planted_elements.description: Thorne was once a pure scientist who cared about knowledge for its own sake. She founded Prometheus to fund research but lost herself in corporate priorities. She misses the joy of understanding and wants to be part of first contact for the science, not just profit.
planted_elements.significance: Rediscovers love of pure knowledge over profit in discovering third option

Thorne tracked Yuki's involvement, traced network back to team
Prometheus offers significant resources: quantum computing, satellites, legal protection
Warning: government containment will follow publication immediately
Thorne was Yuki's doctoral advisor before going corporate
Strategic advice: lead with Riemann Hypothesis proof for best public reception
